quest.name: Overcommitment
journal:
A number of Namazu have dancing fever, and Seigetsu the Enlightened has the cure for what ails them.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested goods to the Namazu apothecary.
Distribute the reinvigorating elixir to the Namazu dancers.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the Namazu apothecaryMine [Error] to the northeast of the Dawn ThroneGather [Error] to the northeast of the Dawn ThroneCatch [Error] at lower Yat Khaal.
Distribute the reinvigorating elixir to the Namazu dancers.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: The Oronir in their munificence have seen fit to teach us another of their traditions: a ritual dance to curry favor with the gods before competing in the Azim Bökh.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Needless to say, those seeking to participate in our wrestling competition have been sent to the Dawn Throne to master this dance. But that was three days ago, and I'm certain they lack the common sense to stop dancing without being told.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Assuming they've yet to shuffle off their mortal coils to dance for the gods in person, I thought it prudent we send provisions to bolster their strength. Our apothecary is preparing them as we speak. Would you check on him and see that he has everything he needs?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: At last, a pair of helping hands.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Try as I might, I simply cannot finish this elixir without a still. I don't suppose you could fashion one for me? This crate should have all you need. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Try as I might, I simply cannot finish this elixir without a strainer. I don't suppose you could fashion one for me? This crate should have all you need. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: I've been trying to mix a special reagent needed for my elixir, but I'm all fins. I don't suppose you could do it for me? This crate should have all you need. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text:
I need you to collect soil from outcrops here near the Dawn Throne. When sifted, it yields minerals that serve as a potent stimulant. Yes, yes. I need that stimulant!
...Ahem. For the dancers. Yes, yes. The dancers.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text:
I need you to collect herbs from the shrubs here near the Dawn Throne. When distilled, they yield a very potent stimulant. Yes, yes. I need that stimulant!
...Ahem. For the dancers. Yes, yes. The dancers.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: I need you to catch a fishy fish from the lower Yat Khaal. It is a rather peculiar variety known to be drawn out of hiding with salmon roe. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Because of their diet of algae native to the area, they secrete an enzyme vital to my preparations.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Grant me this one small favor and I can handle the rest.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Come, come. Everything you'll need is here in this crate.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Come, come. Everything you'll need is here in this crate.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Come, come. Everything you'll need is here in this crate.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: The soil I need can be found in abundance here near the Dawn Throne. It shouldn't take you long. No, no.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: The herbs I need can be found in abundance here near the Dawn Throne. It shouldn't take you long. No, no.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Only a fishy fish from the lower Yat Khaal will do. Yes, yes. A fishy fish.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Have you finished with my request?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Excellent work, friend. I need only use this with the other ingredients like so, and...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: Here it is! One sip, and they could dance for a week without cease if they so chose.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text:
Hmmm. That's a long time to go without eating or sleeping...
At any rate, take this to my brethren atop the Dawn Throne, and give them my regards.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03130
dialogue.text: My elixir should give them the energy they need to continue practicing but... Surely they'll take the occasional break for sustenance, right?

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOA03130
dialogue.text: I never realized...<pant> <pant>...a simple dance could be so tiring.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOA03130
dialogue.text: A drink, you say? Why, that would be lovely.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOA03130
dialogue.text: It's delicious! Rough on the tongue, yet sweet with the earthy aroma of mud. Yes, yes. Like a taste of the One River.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOA03130
dialogue.text: I haven't felt this good in ages. Now if you'll excuse me, I have a dance to master.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOB03130
dialogue.text: I fear my legs have gone numb. Am I still dancing?

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOB03130
dialogue.text: Refreshments? Seigetsu never said anything of breaks, but I am quite parched. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOB03130
dialogue.text: Oh my, how invigorating! I can feel my legs again. Perhaps now I can finally stay in step.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOB03130
dialogue.text: Tell Seigetsu to expect a dance unlike any he's ever seen upon our return. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOC03130
dialogue.text: I don't think...<pant>...I can keep this up...<pant>...No, no...

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOC03130
dialogue.text: A drink? <pant> How thoughtful.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOC03130
dialogue.text: What is this strange sensation? I...I feel like...

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOC03130
dialogue.text:
We can dance, we can dance everybody look at your fin.♪
We can dance, we can dance everybody doing a spin.♪

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOA03130
dialogue.text: We'll master this dance. Just you wait and see!

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOB03130
dialogue.text: I'll have to go and thank Seigetsu for this. Yes, yes. After I've learned the dance.

dialogue.name: DANCINGNAMAZUOC03130
dialogue.text:
We'll make this a Namazu dance.♪
Yes, yes. We'll make this a Namazu dance.♪

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: How fare our would-be competitors? They've given up the ghost, haven't they?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Oh, so you reached them in time. Well done. One might say they practiced overmuch, dancing for days and nights without cease. Considering their ineptitude for learning, however, I would argue such a lengthy lesson is good for them.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Why, they might even develop some semblance of work ethic, which can be applied to all that we do. Imagine if all the Namazu followed suit.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Yes, I can send more of my brothers and sisters to practice at the Dawn Throne. I foresee another delivery of provisions in the near future.
